languages.text: {n}Маражай застывает, размышляя.{/n} "Возможно". {n}На его лице появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Насколько ты хочешь остаться? В чью жизнь ты оцениваешь мое снисхождение?"
{n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай застывает, размышляя.{/n} "Возможно". {n}На его лице появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Насколько ты хочешь остаться? В чью жизнь ты оцениваешь мое снисхождение?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"
{n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"
{n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"
{n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋静静地思考着。{/n}“或许确实有办法。”{n}他的脸上露出了一丝微笑。{/n}“你有多想和我在一起？在你心中，谁的性命与我的溺爱同等重要？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋静静地思考着。{/n}“或许确实有办法。”{n}他的脸上露出了一丝微笑。{/n}“你有多想和我在一起？在你心中，谁的性命与我的溺爱同等重要？”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはじっと考え込む。{/n}「ありえるかもな」{n}彼の顔にほんのり笑顔が浮かぶ。{/n}「どれくらい俺といたいんだ？俺の耽溺と同じくらい誰の命を大事にしている？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはじっと考え込む。{/n}「ありえるかもな」{n}彼の顔にほんのり笑顔が浮かぶ。{/n}「どれくらい俺といたいんだ？俺の耽溺と同じくらい誰の命を大事にしている？」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se queda quieto, pensativo.{/n} «Tal vez sí». {n}La sombra de una sonrisa asoma a su rostro.{/n} «¿Cuántas ganas tienes de permanecer a mi lado? ¿Hay alguien cuya vida valores tanto como mi indulgencia?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se queda quieto, pensativo.{/n} «Tal vez sí». {n}La sombra de una sonrisa asoma a su rostro.{/n} «¿Cuántas ganas tienes de permanecer a mi lado? ¿Hay alguien cuya vida valores tanto como mi indulgencia?».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai réfléchit pendant quelques instants, puis l'ombre d'un sourire illumine son visage.{/n} « Peut-être bien. À quel point tenez-vous à ma compagnie ? Quelle vie seriez-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à sacrifier pour que je vous renouvelle ma confiance ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai réfléchit pendant quelques instants, puis l'ombre d'un sourire illumine son visage.{/n} « Peut-être bien. À quel point tenez-vous à ma compagnie ? Quelle vie seriez-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à sacrifier pour que je vous renouvelle ma confiance ? »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verstummt und denkt nach.{/n} "Vielleicht gibt es etwas." {n}Der Hauch eines Lächelns erscheint auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Wie sehr wollt Ihr bei mir bleiben? Wessen Leben schätzt Ihr genau so sehr wie meine Nachsicht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verstummt und denkt nach.{/n} "Vielleicht gibt es etwas. {n}Der Hauch eines Lächelns erscheint auf seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Wie sehr wollt Ihr bei mir bleiben? Wessen Leben schätzt Ihr genau so sehr wie meine Nachsicht?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yerinden kımıldamadan düşünüyor.{/n} "Belki vardır." {n}Yüzünde bir gülümseme izi beliriyor.{/n} "Benimle kalmayı ne kadar istiyorsun? Kimin hayatı, senin için benim hazzım kadar değerli?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai goes still, thinking.{/n} "Perhaps there is." {n}A shadow of a smile appears on his face.{/n} "How much do you want to stay with me? Whose life do you value as much as my indulgence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, yerinden kımıldamadan düşünüyor.{/n} "Belki vardır." {n}Yüzünde bir gülümsemenin izi beliriyor.{/n} "Benimle kalmayı ne kadar istiyorsun? Kimin hayatı, senin için benim hazzım kadar değerli?"
